resources.string: Please select the value that corresponds with your current pain level:
Select the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your usual ACTIVITY?
Select the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your usual SLEEP?
Select the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has affected your MOOD?
Select the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has contributed to your STRESS?
I felt this scale was easy to understand to rate my pain.
I felt this scale was easy to use to rate my pain.
I felt this scale was better than the scale my nurses and doctors use to ask me about my pain.
Thank you for completing the Defense and Veterans Pain Rating Scale.\nPlease return this tablet to your healthcare provider.
